title: LF D2 ADC + for dyanmic Q duo
body:
Master 150 LP support looking for ADC duo to play dynamic Q with and work on different bot lane match ups. 

Looking for someone who is open-minded and relatively non-toxic + comfortable with voice comms.

A bit about myself: I was d5 at the start of the season (and that is where I ended last season). I decided I actively wanted to improve myself at the game.
I review bot lane vods by myself and thought it would be helpful + beneficial to have an adc to review them with. I am constantly working on my own play and trying to improve. 

Ultimately I would like to find someone who is on the same page as me, and we can get along as I believe this builds the best synergy. Keen to try all types of lanes (passive supports + scaling adc's, early aggressive sup + agro adc etc)

I have a couple of analysts that I work with to review my games, so I think this is a good opportunity for an adc who wanted to improve!
Add me for further info / if you're interested

IGN:
eLy bluz0r

replies.body: Aye bluz0r nice work, i remember duo'ing with you when you were D5, solid effort
ty Crowd :D Yeah haha I rmember duoing with you too! Where are you these days? Don't see you online anymore :(
I actually deleted you to make room LOL. I figured id never play with you again hahahaha. PS nothing personal, Just bluzor was at the top of the friends list.
#worth. Was wondering where you had gone to :P
Thank you for your application! We will process if shortly!
you need to fix that head first
yeah.. should be D2+ lol I realized after I posted and tried to edit but it wouldn't let me edit the title T_T

Can confirm this guy is pretty good. 

10/10 would recommend if you're a good ADC wanting to become better, this is a great opportunity.
